WRITING.TITLE: Just purchased Overwatch, Great so far...
WRITING.TEXT:
Awesome game. Really enjoying it. Who are the OP characters? Ive watched some drift0r vids and he gives great in depth info on a variety of things in the game.
As a complete noob im using Soldier 76 he seems to work really well. What are some other great characters?
In a couple vids there's this female character that gets into a mech machine and she looks great...

WRITING.TITLE: Can I download past broadcasts for Android?
WRITING.TEXT:
I love DrDisrespect, i think he's awesome. I enjoy watching his past broascasts on my two hour journeys to and from work. However it's taking its toll on my available gig of Internet lol.
Is there any way I can download the broadcasts using my wifi at home so I dont waste internet streaming it whilst on the move?
Tips on how to get the Nuclear?

Yeah buddy. It's awesome so far. If you have it on PS4 add me dude, we can play together :) subject8932.
Letttttt's go!

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone think the T.H.O.R rocks
WRITING.TEXT:
Got it a couple times and it's awesome, destroys enemies with ease. It's basically the AC130, but stronger.
I gotta say I'm a little dissapointed with the other kistreaks that I have. Looking forward to getting the R-C8

Everything for me is going so well. Glad I can finally run round a corner, see 3 enemies with their back to me and not get scared that I'll kill one and another will spin 180degrees to kill me.
Feels like I can finally get quad kills quite easily!! I'm actually loving it so far. Gun sounds are awesome.
The weapon balancing is not off... IW did a phenomenal job with weapon balancing / hit detection. It's too fast though.

Playstyle: Fun Mic?: I have a mic When?: NOW!!! Username: subject8932 Location: UK Notes: I want to have a fun game, using good tactics, and we will work in sync to win the objectives. Mainly like playing Domination!
wow good on ya.. some really slick kills there.
Argus is quite a risky gun, a very highrisk/highreward weapon, because if you miss you're almost a sitting duck

WRITING.TITLE: What's your shotty set up?
WRITING.TEXT:
I love running the Brecci + Long Barrel + Fast Mags + Extended Mags and I have to have Scavenger and Gung-Ho.
What do you guys enjoy playing with?
I've been tempted to try out the Haymaker, anyone prefer it over the Brecci?

WRITING.TITLE: Creepy links between different movies.
WRITING.TEXT:
Andy's mom is Emily, Jessie's previous owner, from Toy Story.
Do you know any other cool/mysterious theories or links between movies in any way shape or form?
During the iconic diner scene in Pulp Fiction Mia Wallace, played by Uma Thurman, explains the plot of a TV pilot she was in. Her description of a group of female secret agents sounds oddly familiar if you've ever seen another Quentin Tarantino film called Kill Bill. Wallace says that she played a character who was the deadliest woman in the world with a knife (the description given to Thurman's character in Kill Bill). And, of course, during the Pulp Fiction scene Wallace is talking to Vincent Vega, a character who shares the last name of Mr. Blonde (a nickname given to the character Victor Vega) from Reservoir Dogs.
